questions.question: How many colums will be there in CPT table when the node has 2 parents (consider only one column for describing probability of current variable)?

explanations.c: One for each parent and as given in question one for current variable

questions.question: How many rows will be there in CPT table when the node has 2 parents (consider all variables to be binary)?

explanations.d: Total number of possibilities in CPT for different assignements of parents are 2 * 2 = 4

questions.question: Total conditional probability is efficient (always) than Bayesian Netowrk?
How many cycles does Bayesian Network have?
If Pr(X=T/x1,x2) = 0.2 then what is value of Pr(X=F/x1,x2)?
If x1 is the only parent of y in Bayesian network, what can you say about P(y/x1, x2, x3)
